name: Butterflys
text: Butterflys are a widespread group of squamate reptiles, with over 6,000species, ranging across all continents except Antarctica

name: Cervus
text: ucanus cervus, known as the European stag beetle, or the greater stag beetle, is one of the best-known species of stag beetle (family Lucanidae) in Western Europe, and is the eponymous example of the genus.

name: Jays
text: The Eurasian jay (Garrulus glandarius) is a species of passerine bird in the crow family Corvidae. It has pinkish brown plumage with a black stripe on each side of a whitish throat, a bright blue panel on the upper wing and a black tail.
